recommended_degree: Akuntansi, Manajemen, Manajemen Administrasi, Administrasi Logistik, Administrasi (Diploma, Sarjana)
job_description:
Grouping new materials by model in the New Model area.
Supply new material to Prodution for event new project
Supply new material to Engineering for sample PCN to customer
Received and compare base on PO part consumable and actual delivery
Distribution part consumbale to User 
Scan document and filing document from bantex to carton box
Check stock, prepare new material and hand over new material to Dept. MC,PCWH
Accompanying the Kobelco supplier during the inspection in the compressor area.
